    public class SpenBrushPenEraserLayout
extends FrameLayout

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpenBrushPenEraserLayout.ActionListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods to receive the response to Close EraserLayout
      static interface  SpenBrushPenEraserLayout.EventListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods to receive the response to Clear All requests.

      • setEraserPen

        public void setEraserPen()
        Set Eraser Pen (It makes it possible to erase from canvasses.) If current is writing mode, it is changed to Eraser mode. If current is already eraser mode, EraserLayout appears.
        Since:
        5.1.0
